tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: An empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table

interactions.examine: It's an empty tavern, you can go outside via a door to your south, or up, there is a table [[rtavern:tableGreenMug||false==with a green mug]] [[rtavern:tableRedMug||false==and a red mug]]

interactions.examine: An empty bedroom, there is a bed, a stairwell leads down

examinable.door: leads to a hallway with a staircase to the tavern

outside.name: Outside
outside.description: It is dark, there is a tavern to your north[[routside:moon:true==, the moon is out]]

up.onFail: you can't get on the roof
